backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles with access‑controlled get and save operations using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the Industry 4.0 solution card addition and listing related files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text file providing one‑sentence summaries for major frontend source files and components.
frontend/docs/FILE_TREE.md: Markdown document outlining the project's regenerated file structure.
frontend/docs/screenshot-assets-audit.md: Documentation explaining the screenshot asset audit tool and how it identifies referenced vs unreferenced images.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, icons, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify-style redirects defining .well-known handling, ic-assets.json passthrough, and SPA fallback routing.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain verification file listing approved IC domains.
frontend/public/ic-assets.json: IC asset configuration allowing .well-known files to be served.
frontend/scripts/audit-screenshot-assets: Node script scanning assets and source files to report referenced vs unreferenced screenshot-like images.
frontend/scripts/verify-well-known.mjs: Node script validating .well-known, domain files, redirects, and ic-assets.json configuration.
frontend/src/.well-known/ic-domains: Duplicate IC domain verification file stored within src.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes wrapped in the shared SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: A contact form component using react-hook-form with validation, a topic selector, and simulated async submission.
frontend/src/components/home/BrandsBanne: Displays a banner section listing brand logos with simple styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroCarouse: An image carousel with autoplay, drag support, reduced‑motion handling, and slide navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/home/OurExpertie: Renders an industry expertise grid with icons, each revealed on scroll via an animation wrapper.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing branding, navigation links, contact note, and a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with brand logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and state-managed mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and an outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnS: IntersectionObserver-based wrapper that animates children into view unless reduced‑motion is preferred.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Clickable service card showing icon, title, description, and a call-to-action, keyboard accessible.
Dialog panel showing detailed service info including overview, features, applications, and a contact link.
Search and category filter bar for services using Input and Select components.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding config defining logos, meta assets, and company info.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines the Service type and a list of service entries with metadata and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login flow, identity persistence, and state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file kept for compatibility with no active backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Hook detecting the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Hook that updates document title and SEO-related meta tags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables, themes, utilities, and slideshow styles.
frontend/src/main.static.tsx: Static build entry that initializes React with a QueryClient and renders App.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main entry enabling Internet Identity and react-query before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, company overview text, and a list of automation capabilities using animated scroll reveals.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the Contact page with SEO settings, contact details, a Google Maps embed, and a form wrapped in scroll animations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the Home page with SEO, animated hero text, calls to action, a carousel, and promotional banners for services and brands.
frontend/src/pages/SolutionsPage.tsx: Builds the Solutions page with filters, searchable service cards, and a detail panel, applying SEO metadata and scroll animations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, themes, fonts, animations, and enabling typography and container query plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related tooling with ESNext modules, bundler resolution, and composite project setup.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, a custom verification plugin, alias setup, and build/server settings.
project_state.json: JSON describing current project state, known issues, and pending feature requests including Industry 4.0 card and renaming a heading.
